Sisters-in-law Veronica Miele Beard and Veronica Swanson Beard founded their eponymous label in 2010 around a singular garment: the dickey. The brand’s uptown-meets-downtown aesthetic became a favorite among legions of women. Seven years later, the duo decided to parlay that success into a denim-centric follow-up line. Filled with laid-back yet polished tops, jackets, and of course, jeans...
